text:
emia (thal-uh-SEE-me-uh) are two other common forms of SCD.
                
Some Forms of Sickle Cell Disease
                
Hemoglobin SS
                
Hemoglobin SC
                
Hemoglobin S0 thalassemia
                
Hemoglobin S+ thalassemia
                
Hemoglobin SD
                
Hemoglobin SE
                

                
Overview
                
Cells in tissues need a steady supply of oxygen to work well. Normally, hemoglobin in red blood cells takes up oxygen
